acf.egsr_quicktip: YOU CRAVE THE FUN AND EXCITEMENT OF ADVENTURE BUT ALWAYS SEEK BALANCE TO GROUND YOURSELF...
acf.egsr_step1_descr:
YOU CRAVE THE FUN AND EXCITEMENT OF ADVENTURE BUT ALWAYS SEEK BALANCE TO GROUND YOURSELF...

Wow, {FIRSTNAME}, this is very unusual...

Your soul is vibrating in two different frequencies.

One frequency is craving adventure and the other is seeking balance…

These different vibrations combined are the specific essence of a true romantic…

You can fully appreciate the deep poetry... in a beautiful sunset… or in a moonlit sky.

The part of yourself which needs balance thrives on keeping things light...

and instinctively turning away from the negative… taking on the role of a mediator, smoothing over the bumps of life and serving as a peacemaker.

Do you realize people are actually drawn toward you due to your balanced aura {FIRSTNAME}?

But you’re not just about balance are you?

The adventurous part of your soul is forever coming up with ideas.

And I sense that you’ve probably spent your whole life juggling many things at once.

But... somehow you’re brilliant… magically getting it all done, working hard to keep all the castles in your sky afloat.

Maintaining balance isn’t easy… and sometimes the different frequencies in your soul conflict…

But deep down you know—that everything you’ve ever worked towards is part of a much bigger picture.

You know you were born to make a big impact by helping humanity.

I also sense that you are at a crossroads in your life regarding moving toward that mission now.

And I can feel that you’ve been looking for a sign from the Universe so you know which direction to go...

From my reading today I feel that an additional “Energy Reading” is necessary to find out exactly what’s been holding you back from completing your life mission all these years…
acf.egsr_step2_descr:
IF YOU WANT THE MOST OUT OF LIFE, YOU MUST STEP OUTSIDE OF YOUR COMFORT ZONE…

{FIRSTNAME}, I feel your energy as a nurturing shield… a dome of love sheltering your family and friendships… bringing meaning, equality and balance into their lives.

It makes sense for a balanced soul to avoid negative vibrations… they just don’t feel good.

But your energy resonates with so much more. It longs to quench its thirst for adventure… which can only be found OUTSIDE your comfort zone.

It’s incredibly difficult to raise your frequency when you worry about what could go wrong… or retreat to safety when you feel the balance is off…

Your soul came into this physical life to awaken more fully… and I sense there are very important lessons it yearns to learn.

~ Hesitating instead of taking action won’t bring you closer to your destiny.
~ Caring for others while neglecting yourself will only drain your energy.
~ Balance can’t be created from overthinking decisions… it comes from within.

Your life will ONLY find true balance when your soul deeply understands and accepts this wisdom.

And this balance will empower you to fulfill your divine mission...
This is a very critical time on your path {FIRSTNAME}. The decisions you make at this time will have a huge impact on your life for years to come.

The way to know if you’re actually on the right path is usually found through a light reading… I’d like to give you one for free but first I need to ask you a few questions…
acf.egsr_step3_descr:
Your light reading is STRONG {FIRSTNAME} and you’re on the right path.

I believe there’s a great opportunity on the horizon for you…

The negative energy of worries that keeps you from achieving the things you’ve always wanted—will be vanquished by blinding light when you make steps towards your soul’s awakening…

Then, you’ll be filled with new hope… and the adventure of romance and wonder that lights you up inside… the beautiful sunsets… the star lit skies… will be yours.

Listen to your soul…

Be brave and direct your energy now, to flooding your life with light.
